long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claritysoft CRM for Gmail enables you to save both inbound and outbound Gmail messages to Claritysoft CRM.  The Claritysoft CRM Extension is fully integrated with Gmail and provides the following capabilities

• Save inbound and outbound email to Claritysoft contacts with a matching email
• Save a copy of the Gmail message under all email recipients
• Add a new Contact if the sender email address is not found in Claritysoft CRM
• Save email attachments
